attributes.action: Fully devolve agriculture, fishing and farming to the Scottish Parliament
attributes.additional_details: These are very key things to Scotland and not Westminster and they should be devolved, because I think the Scottish government will develop it all better than the UK government would.  But I would also call on the UK government to devolve some powers over immigration, so that we can allow EU nationals to stay in Scotland after Brexit.
attributes.background: It looks like the UK government is looking to really take back control from us, Scotland.  So, I now call on the UK government to fully devolve agriculture, fishing, farming and genetically modification to the Scottish Parliament.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

Responsibility for agriculture and fisheries is already devolved in Scotland. You can find out more about what is devolved here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/devolution-settlement-scotland

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the UK Government to devolve responsibility for immigration policy in Scotland to the Scottish Parliament.
